Basic line structure¶

A basic line has this format

[[evaluatable] variable_name "="] [evaluatable] [";"]

So, for example:

eggs = "spam"

By default, a variable’s type is dynamical, and can change. You can set a variable’s type like this:

Integer eggs = 12
